doc:
Susan Stephen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Susan_Stephen 0 Susan Rennie Stephen (16 July 1931 – 21 April 2000) was an English film actress. Born in London, she was known in the 1950s for appearing in a number of B-films. She appeared in over 20 films including The Red Beret (1953), The House Across the Lake (1954), Pacific Destiny (1956) and Carry On Nurse (1959). Her film appearances became less frequent following her second marriage to film director Nicolas Roeg from 1957 to 1977. Susan_Rennie_Stephen ( 16_July_1931 – 21_April_2000 ) was an_English_film_actress . Born in London , she was_known in the_1950s for appearing in a_number of B-films . She appeared in over_20_films including The_Red_Beret ( 1953_) , The_House Across the_Lake_(_1954_) , Pacific_Destiny_(_1956_) and Carry On Nurse_(_1959_) . Her_film_appearances became less_frequent following her_second_marriage to film_director_Nicolas_Roeg from 1957 to 1977 .
